overview: DEE DAVIS INC is a certified EDWOSB construction contractor specializing in government facility projects. With proven experience in federal, state, and local construction contracts, we deliver quality work on time and within budget while meeting all socioeconomic requirements.

core_competencies.title: General Construction Services
core_competencies.description: Building renovation, facility maintenance, site improvements, concrete work, landscaping

core_competencies.title: Government Project Management
core_competencies.description: Federal, state, and local contracts | Prevailing wage compliance | Certified payroll reporting

core_competencies.title: DBE/EDWOSB Subcontracting
core_competencies.description: Established network of certified subcontractors | Compliance management | Quality oversight

benefits.title: EDWOSB/DBE Certified
benefits.description: Meets socioeconomic and diversity contracting goals

benefits.title: Bonded & Insured
benefits.description: $2M bonding capacity | $2M general liability | Workers compensation

benefits.title: On-Time Performance
benefits.description: 95%+ on-schedule completion | Proactive communication | Change order management

benefits.title: Safety First
benefits.description: OSHA compliance | Safety training programs | Zero tolerance for violations

certifications: EDWOSB (Economically Disadvantaged Women-Owned Small Business) - SBA Certified
commitment: DEE DAVIS INC is committed to delivering quality construction services that meet or exceed project specifications. We prioritize safety, transparency, and professional communication throughout every phase of the project, ensuring successful outcomes for government agencies and the communities they serve.
